ul.li: Channels are the mediums through which your router transmits signals to other devices.
There are several channels that one can choose from, based on the Frequency at which your router works (Bands â€“ 2.4 GHz or 5GHz) and the premises.

body.p: Step A: Download any Wi-Fi Analyzer software from Internet (It is a Freeware). Step B: Choose to view different channels. We have provided an Example for better understanding. Step C: Channel numbers for 2.4 GHz will be in the range of 1 to 14, whereas for 5 GHz band will be > 36. Step D: Wi-Fi analyzer will show which channel is being utilized most and which one the least. Refer the example in the next slide. Choosing a channel with least utilization will give maximum advantage.
